tuv.prop: The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
Use this button to open a dialog, activate the check box Project specific segmentation rules, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired.
tuv.seg: The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
Sääntöjä voidaan kuitenkin räätälöidä projektikohtaisesti.

tuv.prop: When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.
tuv.seg: Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
Kuvittele kääntäväsi jotakin; yhdestä tiedostosta kansioon, joka sisältää alakansiota, joissa on useita tiedostoja monissa eri tiedostomuodoissa.

tuv.prop: In order to get credentials for MS Translator, follow these steps:
Log into Microsoft Azure Marketplace: http://datamarket.azure.com/
You can use normal navigation to go to e.g. the next (untranslated) segment that matches the search criteria.
tuv.seg: Press the Filter button on the bottom to limit the shown entries in the editor window to those that match the current search.
Paina Suodatin-näppäintä alareunassa rajoittaaksesi näytetyt hakusanat editorissa niihin, jotka vastaavat hakua.

tuv.prop: The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
tuv.seg: regular expressions
säännölliset lausekkeet

tuv.prop: Keyword searches are similar to a search "with all of the words" in an Internet search engine such as Google (AND logic).
tuv.seg: Using keyword search with open file will thus find all occurrences of the string open file, as well as file opened, open input file, file may not be safe to open, etc.
Avainsanahaku sanoille ”open file” löytää siis kaikki esiintymät merkkijonolle “open file”, kuten myös “file opened”, “open input file”, “file may not be safe to open” jne.
Options
Asetukset

tuv.prop: • Untranslated: search only in untranslated segments.
• Display: file names: if checked, the name of the file where each segment is found is displayed above each result.
tuv.seg: • Display: all matching segments: if checked, all the segments are displayed one by one, even if they are present several times in the same document or in different documents.
• Näytä: kaikki täsmäävät segmentit: kaikki täsmäävät segmentit näytetään erikseen, vaikka osumia olisi useampi samassa asiakirjassa tai eri asiakirjoissa.

tuv.prop: Replaces the target segment{j}with the machine translation{j}of the source.
tuv.seg: No action, if{j}machine tools are deactivated
Toiminto ei ole käytössä, jos konekäännöstyökaluja ei ole otettu käyttöön

tuv.prop: This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used.
tuv.seg: Command
Komento

tuv.prop: The word or phrase is entered in the Search for box automatically.
Click the dropdown arrow of the Search for box to access the last 10 searches.
tuv.seg: You can have several Search windows open at the same time, but close them when they are no longer needed so that they do not clutter your desktop.
Sinulla voi olla useita hakuikkunoita auki samaan aikaan, mutta sulje ne, kun et enää tarvitse niitä. Näin ne eivät sekoita työpöytääsi.

tuv.prop: As OmegaT handles identical segments as one single entity, only the first unique segment is shown.
tuv.seg: Pressing the search button after entering a string in the search field displays all the segments in the project that include the entered string.
Hakupainikkeen painaminen sen jälkeen, kun on syöttänyt merkkijonon hakukenttään, näyttää kaikki projektin segmentit, jotka sisältävät annetun merkkijonon.

tuv.prop: Select the method using the radio buttons.
tuv.seg: The following search methods are available:
Käytettävissä ovat seuraavat hakumenetelmät:

tuv.prop: The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
tuv.seg: Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
Huomaa, että merkeillä ”*” ja ”?” on erityinen merkitys säännöllisissä lausekkeissa, joten tässä kuvattu jokerimerkkihaku koskee vain tarkkaa hakua ja avainsanahakua (katso alla).

tuv.prop: Searching for open file will thus find all occurrences of the string open file, but not file opened or open input file.
Search for segments containing all keywords you specified, in any order.
tuv.seg: keyword search
haku avainsanoilla

tuv.prop: See more in the chapter Regular Expressions.
• case sensitive: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
tuv.seg: Additionally to one of the methods above you can select the following:
Edellä mainittujen menetelmien lisäksi voit valita seuraavista:

tuv.prop: OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
tuv.seg: File Filters
Tiedostosuodattimet

tuv.prop: Select keyword search to search for any number of individual full words, in any order.
Keyword searches are similar to a search "with all of the words" in an Internet search engine such as Google (AND logic).
tuv.seg: OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.
OmegaT näyttää listan kaikista segmenteistä, jotka sisältävät kaikki määritellyt sanat.

tuv.prop: Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
tuv.seg: External Post-processing
Ulkoinen jälkikäsittely

tuv.prop: The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by OmegaT.
tuv.seg: Enable Sentence-level{j}segmentation
Ota käyttöön virketason segmentointi{j}

tuv.prop: OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
tuv.seg: Translate the file
Käännä tiedosto

tuv.prop: • Search in Files: search in a single file or a folder containing a set of files.
Consequently, although OmegaT is quite able to handle tmx files, it does not include them in the Search files search.
tuv.seg: When searching through files (as opposed to translation memories), OmegaT restricts the search to files in source file formats.
Hakiessaan tiedostoista (käännösmuistien sijaan) OmegaT rajaa haun tiedostoihin, jotka ovat lähdetiedoston formaatissa.
Searches
Haut

tuv.prop: • Editing field behavior: a short chapter describing how to set up the editing behavior of the segment being translated.
• Translation memories: explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
tuv.seg: • Working with plain text and Working with formatted text: these two chapters explain certain important points concerning texts to be translated, such as the encoding set (in the case of plain text files) and tag handling (in the case of formatted text).

Pelkän tekstin käsittely ja muotoillun tekstin käsittely: nämä kaksi kappaletta selittävät tärkeitä käännettävien tekstien ominaisuuksia, kuten koodaus (kun kyseessä on pelkkä teksti) ja merkintöjen käsittely (kun kyseessä on muotoiltu teksti).
Closes the current project.
Sulkee nykyisen projektin.

tuv.prop: As OmegaT handles identical segments as one single entity, only the first unique segment is shown.
Translated segments are displayed with the original text at the top and the translated text at the bottom, untranslated segments are displayed as the source only.
tuv.seg: The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
Segmentit näkyvät siinä järjestyksessä, jossa ne esiintyvät projektissa.

tuv.prop: It is possible to modify the project properties during a translation session.
tuv.seg: The Project → Properties...{j}(Ctrl+E) dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
{j}Projekti -> Ominaisuudet (Ctrl + E) -valintaikkunaa käytetään projektikansion ja -kielten määrittämiseen ja muokkaamiseen.

tuv.prop: The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
Regular expressions are a powerful way to look for instances of a string.
tuv.seg: The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
Esimerkiksi haettava merkkijono - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - edellä mainitussa esimerkissä etsii kohdesegmenteistä sanoja, jotka sisältävät epäilyttäviä merkkejä saksalaiselta näppäimistöltä.

tuv.prop: Using keyword search with open file will thus find all occurrences of the string open file, as well as file opened, open input file, file may not be safe to open, etc.
tuv.seg: Searches
Haut

tuv.prop: Save Ctrl+S Saves the current work to the
tuv.seg: internal translation memory
sisäinen käännösmuisti

tuv.prop: Make a slight change anywhere in the project.
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
See chapter Source Segmentation for more information on segmentation rules.
tuv.seg: To delete project specific segmentation rules, uncheck the check box.
Projektikohtaisten segmentointisääntöjen poistamiseksi poistetaan valinta.
OmegaT is a free multi platform Computer Aided Translation tool, with the following highlights:
OmegaT on ilmainen monelle alustalle sopiva tietokoneavusteinen käännöstyökalu, jolla on seuraavat ominaisuudet:

tuv.prop: Click the dropdown arrow of the Search for box to access the last 10 searches.
• File > Search for selection (Ctrl+F): refocus on the search field and select all its contents.
tuv.seg: The Search window has its own menus:
Hakuikkunalla on omat valikkonsa:

tuv.prop: Search Project Ctrl+F Opens a new Search window.
tuv.seg: Menu and Keyboard shortcuts
Valikko ja pikanäppäimet

tuv.prop: You can use normal navigation to go to e.g. the next (untranslated) segment that matches the search criteria.
• A search may be limited to 1000 items, so if you search on a common phrase, the editor then shows only those 1000 matching entries, and not all entries that match the search criteria.
tuv.seg: NB:
Huom:

tuv.prop: Alternatively, you can select a word or phrase in the Editor pane, Fuzzy matches pane or Glossary pane and hit Ctrl+F.
You can have several Search windows open at the same time, but close them when they are no longer needed so that they do not clutter your desktop.
tuv.seg: The word or phrase is entered in the Search for box automatically.
Sana tai lauseke ilmestyy hakuruutuun automaattisesti.

tuv.prop: For instance, 'run?' would match the word 'runs' and 'runn' in the word 'running'.
Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
tuv.seg: The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
Osumat näkyvät lihavoituna sinisellä.

tuv.prop: On Apple keyboards the cmd key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
tuv.seg: • Project management
Projektinhallinta
Segmentoinnin säännöt

tuv.prop: OmegaT supports an extensive use of dictionaries and glossaries.
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
tuv.seg: If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
Mikäli internet-yhteys on käytettävissä, useat eri konekäänninpalvelut kuten Google Translate ja Microsoft Translator ovat käytettävissä OmegaT:ssä.

tuv.prop: • File > Search for selection (Ctrl+F): refocus on the search field and select all its contents.
• Edit > Insert source (Ctrl+Shift+I): insert current segment source.
tuv.seg: • File > Close (Ctrl+W): close the search window (in the same way as Esc)
• Tiedosto > Sulje (Ctrl+W): sulje hakuikkuna (samalla tavoin kuin Esc-näppäimellä)

tuv.prop: You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
tuv.seg: Searches
Haut

tuv.prop: • in translations: search in the target segments
• in comments: search in comments to segments
tuv.seg: • in notes: search in notes to segments
• huomautuksista: hakee segmenttien huomautuksista

tuv.prop: They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
The search term 'run*' for example would match words 'run', 'runs' and 'running'.
tuv.seg: • '*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
• “*” vastaa nollaa tai sitä useampia merkkejä sen sijainnista annetussa sanassa sanan loppuun.

tuv.prop: At the same time, it can use memories files from previous translations for reference.
tuv.seg: OmegaT stores your translations in a translation memory file.
OmegaT tallentaa käännöksesi käännösmuistitiedostoon.

tuv.prop: Check TMs to include the translation memories located in the tm folder in the search.
• Search in Files: search in a single file or a folder containing a set of files.
tuv.seg: Check Glossaries to include the glossaries located in the glossary folder in the search.
Valitse Sanastot sisällyttääksesi sanastokansiossa sijaitsevat sanastot hakuun.

tuv.prop: Double-clicking on a segment opens it in the Editor for modifications (one single click does it when Auto-sync with Editor option is checked).
tuv.seg: You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
Voit sitten siirtyä takaisin hakuikkunaan nähdäksesi seuraavan löydetyn segmentin esimerkiksi tarkistaaksesi ja tarvittaessa korjataksesi terminologiaa.

tuv.prop: You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
Tokenizers corresponding to the selected languages are displayed.
tuv.seg: Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
Huomaa, että kielen vaihtamisesta voi seurata se, että käytössä olevasta käännösmuistista ei ole enää hyötyä, sillä kieliparit eivät vastaa uusia kieliä.

tuv.prop: Saves the current work to the
tuv.seg: internal translation memory
sisäiseen käännösmuistiin

tuv.prop: Displays a dialog to locate an existing project.
tuv.seg: Save
Tallenna

tuv.prop: • Space matches nbsp: when this option is checked, a space character put in search entry can match either a normal space character or a non-breacking space (\u00A) character.
• in translations: search in the target segments
tuv.seg: • in source: search in the source segments
• lähteestä: hakee lähdesegmenteistä

tuv.prop: More precisely, OmegaT attempts to match each filter's source
tuv.seg: File Filters
Tiedostosuodattimet

tuv.prop: If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
tuv.seg: OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.

OmegaT käyttää standardia tmx tiedostomuotoa käännösmuistien tallentamiseen ja käyttämiseen, joka takaa, että voit vaihtaa käännösmateriaaliasi muiden tietokoneavusteisten käännössovellusten, jotka tukevat tätä tiedostomuotoa, kanssa.

tuv.prop: The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
tuv.seg: For instance, 'run?' would match the word 'runs' and 'runn' in the word 'running'.
Esimerkiksi ”run?” vastaa sana ”runs” ja “runn” sanassa ”running”.

tuv.prop: Ctrl is used on Windows, UNIX and UNIX-like operating systems with keyboards featuring a Ctrl / Control key.
On Apple keyboards the cmd key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
tuv.seg: Mac users should instead use the cmd+key.
Mac-käyttäjien on sen sijaan käytettävä cmd-näppäintä.

tuv.prop: As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
index entries, bookmarks, bookmark references, notes, comments, presentation notes, links (URL), sheet names

tuv.seg: Exports the current selection to a text file for processing.
Vie valinnan käsiteltäväksi tekstitiedostoon.

tuv.prop: Change the encoding of{j}your files to Unicode
Change the file extension from .txt to .utf8.
tuv.seg: open your source file in a text editor that correctly interprets its encoding and save the file in "UTF-8" encoding.
Avaa lähdetiedosto tekstieditorissa, joka tulkitsee koodauksen oikein ja tallenna tiedosto ”UTF-8”-merkistökoodaukseen.
Saves the current work to the
Tallentaa työn

tuv.prop: Terminology management is important for translation consistency.
For your reference, OmegaT displays the translation of any word that is both present in the segment and registered in the glossary.
tuv.seg: OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain.
OmegaT käyttää yksittäisten sanojen tai pienten lauseiden muodostavia sanastoja: yksinkertaistettu kaksikielinen erikoisalan sanakirja.
Export Selection
Vie valinta

tuv.prop: • Translated or untranslated: search in both translated and untranslated segments.
• Untranslated: search only in untranslated segments.
tuv.seg: • Translated: search only in translated segments.
• Käännetyistä: hakee vain käännetyistä segmenteistä.

tuv.prop: • Aggregate tags: if checked, tags without translatable text between them will be aggregated into single tags.
tuv.seg: File Filters
Tiedostosuodattimet

tuv.prop: You can have several Search windows open at the same time, but close them when they are no longer needed so that they do not clutter your desktop.

Napsauta hakuruudun pudotusvalikon nuolta saadaksesi esille 10 viimeisintä hakua.

tuv.prop: Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).

tuv.prop: OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.

in the project's omegat
projektin omegat-

tuv.prop: After you have translated each segment, press Ctrl+U to move to the next untranslated segment (or Ctrl+Shift+U to move to the next translated segment).
tuv.seg: OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
OmegaT antaa sinulle yhden segmentin kerrallaan käännettäväksi.

tuv.prop: Here you can select different subfolders, for instance the subfolder with source files, subfolder for target files etc.

Tiedostojen sijainnit

tuv.prop: Translated segments are displayed with the original text at the top and the translated text at the bottom, untranslated segments are displayed as the source only.
You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
tuv.seg: Double-clicking on a segment opens it in the Editor for modifications (one single click does it when Auto-sync with Editor option is checked).
Kaksoisklikkaamalla segmenttiä se aukeaa editoriin muutoksia varten (yksi klikkaus avaa segmentin silloin kun vaihtoehto Automaattinen synkronointi editorin kanssa on valittuna).
Documents
Asiakirjat

tuv.prop: In the Search window, you can use standard shortcuts (Ctrl+N, Ctrl+P) to move from one segment to another.
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
tuv.seg: The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
Segmentointisäännöt ovat yleensä voimassa kaikissa projekteissa.

tuv.prop: open your source file in a text editor that correctly interprets its encoding and save the file in "UTF-8" encoding.
OmegaT will automatically interpret the file as a UTF-8 file.
tuv.seg: Change the file extension from .txt to .utf8.
Muuta tiedostotunniste .txt:stä .utf8:ksi.

tuv.prop: • Segmentation:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
tuv.seg: In OmegaT, segments can be based on paragraphs or on segmentation rules.
OmegaT:ssä segmentit voivat perustua kappaleisiin tai segmentointisääntöihin.

tuv.prop: • in notes: search in notes to segments
• Translated or untranslated: search in both translated and untranslated segments.

• kommenteista: hakee segmenttien kommenttiosioista

tuv.prop: • If a search removes duplicates, those duplicates will not be in the Editor.

Poistaaksesi suodattimen paina Poista suodatin-painiketta tai lataa projekti uudelleen.

tuv.prop: Press the Filter button on the bottom to limit the shown entries in the editor window to those that match the current search.

Normaalin navigoinnin avulla voit siirtyä esimerkiksi seuraavaan (kääntämättömään) segmenttiin, joka vastaa hakuehtoja.

5.{j}Suodata hakusanoja editorissa{j}haun mukaan

tuv.prop: If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.

Poista tagit

tuv.prop: • Translated: search only in translated segments.
• Display: all matching segments: if checked, all the segments are displayed one by one, even if they are present several times in the same document or in different documents.
tuv.seg: • Untranslated: search only in untranslated segments.
• Kääntämättömistä: hakee vain kääntämättömistä segmenteistä.

tuv.prop: Pressing the search button after entering a string in the search field displays all the segments in the project that include the entered string.
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.

OmegaT käsittelee identtisiä segmenttejä yhtenä yksikkönä, joten vain ensimmäinen ainutlaatuinen segmentti näytetään.

tuv.prop: Sign in to the site first or - if it is your first time on the site, register for it and note your user name and password for the future projects.
Create a new project on ProjectLocker

Määritä uusi projekti

tuv.prop: Change the file extension from .txt to .utf8.
This is the most commonsense alternative, sparing you problems in the long run.
tuv.seg: OmegaT will automatically interpret the file as a UTF-8 file.
OmegaT tulkitsee automaattisesti tiedoston UTF-8-tiedostoksi.

Valikko ja pikanäppäimet

tuv.prop: • Display: file names: if checked, the name of the file where each segment is found is displayed above each result.
Check TMs to include the translation memories located in the tm folder in the search.
tuv.seg: • Search in Project: check Memory to include the project memory (project_save.tmx file) in the search.
• Haku projektista: valitse Muisti sisällyttääksesi projektin muistin (project_save.tmx-tiedosto) hakuun.

tuv.prop: Search for segments containing the exact string you specified.
Searching for open file will thus find all occurrences of the string open file, but not file opened or open input file.
tuv.seg: An exact search looks for a phrase, i.e. if several words are entered, they are found only if they occur in exactly that sequence.
Tarkka haku etsii lauseketta, toisin sanoen jos hakuun on syötetty useita sanoja, ne löytyvät vain jos ne esiintyvät juuri kyseisessä järjestyksessä.
Menu and Keyboard shortcuts
Valikko ja pikanäppäimet

tuv.prop: Rename the current project_save.tmx file ( e.g. to project_save.tmx.temporary)
Select the backup translation memory that is most likely - e.g. the most recent one, or the last version from the day before) to contain the data you are looking for
• OmegaT on the web: information regarding on-line OmegaT resources
• Keyboard shortcuts in the editor: the list of shortcuts used in the editor
tuv.seg: • Languages: the ISO list of languages and language codes is provided
Kielet: ISO-standardin luettelo kielistä ja koodeista on tarjolla

tuv.prop: An exact search looks for a phrase, i.e. if several words are entered, they are found only if they occur in exactly that sequence.
tuv.seg: Search for segments containing the exact string you specified.
Etsii segmentit, jotka sisältävät täsmällisesti määrittelemäsi merkkijonon.

tuv.prop: When Full/Half width char insensitive option is checked, searches for fullwidth forms (CJK characters) will match halfwidth forms and vice versa.
Pressing the search button after entering a string in the search field displays all the segments in the project that include the entered string.

4.{j}Hakutulosten näyttö

tuv.prop: The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
tuv.seg: The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
Haun merkkijonoa pidetään säännöllisenä lausekkeena.

tuv.prop: The Search window has its own menus:
• File > Close (Ctrl+W): close the search window (in the same way as Esc)
tuv.seg: • File > Search for selection (Ctrl+F): refocus on the search field and select all its contents.
• Tiedosto > Etsi valikoimasta (Ctrl+F): keskitä uudelleen hakukenttään ja valitse sen koko sisältö.

tuv.prop: Tokenizers corresponding to the selected languages are displayed.

Lisätietoja {i>Tunnisteet<i}-liitteestä.

tuv.prop: The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by OmegaT.
In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
tuv.seg: The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
Virketason segmentointi on yleisin segmentointitapa, joten tämä valinta on suositeltavaa pitää valittuna.

tuv.prop: • Edit > Create Glossary Entry (Ctrl+Shift+G): add a new glossary item.
In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
tuv.seg: 2.{j}Using wild cards
2.{j} Jokerimerkkien käyttäminen

tuv.prop: • Translation memories: explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
In OmegaT, segments can be based on paragraphs or on segmentation rules.
tuv.seg: • Segmentation:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
Segmentointi: käännösmuistityökalut käsittelevät tekstinyksikköjä, joita kutsutaan segmenteiksi.

tuv.prop: • Edit > Replace with source (Ctrl+Shift+R): replace with current segment source.
tuv.seg: • Edit > Create Glossary Entry (Ctrl+Shift+G): add a new glossary item.
• Muokkaa > Luo hakusana sanastoon (Ctrl+Shift+G): lisää uusi sanastokohde.

tuv.prop: The search term 'run*' for example would match words 'run', 'runs' and 'running'.
For instance, 'run?' would match the word 'runs' and 'runn' in the word 'running'.
tuv.seg: • '?' matches any single character.
• ”?” vastaa mitä hyvänsä yksittäistä merkkiä.

tuv.prop: It is consequently able to use the huge range of free spelling dictionaries available for these applications.

tuv.seg: • Keyword index: an extensive keyword index is provided to help the reader find the relevant information.
Avainsanahakemisto: kattava avainsanahakemisto, joka auttaa lukijaa löytämään tarvittavat tiedot.

tuv.prop: Note: the segment marker displays <segment nnnn +yy more> when the segment is nonunique.

Depending upon the preferred editing behavior, the editing field for the untranslated segment may be empty, contain the source text, or contain the translation of the string most similar to the one to be translated.
tuv.seg: In that case, yy is the number of other occurrences of the segment in the project.
Tällöin yy on se luku, kuinka monta kertaa segmentti esiintyy projektissa.

tuv.prop: The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
See more in the chapter Regular Expressions.
tuv.seg: Regular expressions are a powerful way to look for instances of a string.
Säännölliset lausekkeet ovat tehokas tapa etsiä merkkijonon esiintymiä.
documents in the project's
asiakirjat projektin

tuv.prop: Open the Search window with Ctrl+F and enter the word or phrase you wish to search for in the Search for box.
The word or phrase is entered in the Search for box automatically.
tuv.seg: Alternatively, you can select a word or phrase in the Editor pane, Fuzzy matches pane or Glossary pane and hit Ctrl+F.
Voit vaihtoehtoisesti valita sanan tai lausekkeen editoriruudusta, sumean osuman ruudusta tai sanastoruudusta ja painaa Ctrl+F.
Käännösmuistien päivittäminen

tuv.prop: Open project Ctrl+O Displays a dialog to locate an existing project.

Projektinhallinnan pikanäppäimet

tuv.prop: Justification of source and target segments depends upon the project languages.

Oikealta vasemmalle luettavat kielet

kohdekansioon ja luo

Regex tools and examples of use

tuv.seg: Create Translated
Luo käännetyt

tuv.prop: When searching through files (as opposed to translation memories), OmegaT restricts the search to files in source file formats.
If you click on the button Advanced options additional criteria (author or changer of the translation, date translated, excluding orphan segments, etc) can be selected.
tuv.seg: Consequently, although OmegaT is quite able to handle tmx files, it does not include them in the Search files search.
Näin ollen, vaikka OmegaT pystyy varsin hyvin käsittelemään tmx-tiedostoja, se ei sisällä niitä hakuun tiedostoista.

tuv.prop: Thus, when translating from Canadian French the rules for Canadian French - if any - will be applied first, followed by the rules for French and lastly, by the Default rules.
An exact search looks for a phrase, i.e. if several words are entered, they are found only if they occur in exactly that sequence.
tuv.seg: Searching for open file will thus find all occurrences of the string open file, but not file opened or open input file.
Jos siis haet sanoja “open file” löydät kaikki esiintymät merkkijonolle “open file” mutta ei “file opened” tai “open input file”.

tuv.prop: Additionally to one of the methods above you can select the following:
• Space matches nbsp: when this option is checked, a space character put in search entry can match either a normal space character or a non-breacking space (\u00A) character.
tuv.seg: • case sensitive: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
• merkkikoon huomiointi: haku tehdään täsmällisesti määritellylle merkkijonolle; toisin sanoen isot kirjaimet huomioidaan.

tuv.prop: In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
• '*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
tuv.seg: They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
Niiden merkitys on Word-ohjelman käyttäjille tuttu:

tuv.prop: In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by glueing together existing sentence translations.
tuv.seg: Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories.
Asetuksen muuttaminen ei vaikuta jo olemassa olevien käännösmuistien segmentointiin.
Replaces the target segment{j}with the machine translation{j}of the source.
Korvaa kohdesegmentin konekäännöksellä

tuv.prop: • Display: all matching segments: if checked, all the segments are displayed one by one, even if they are present several times in the same document or in different documents.
• Search in Project: check Memory to include the project memory (project_save.tmx file) in the search.
tuv.seg: • Display: file names: if checked, the name of the file where each segment is found is displayed above each result.
• Näytä: tiedostonimet: jokaisen tuloksen yläpuolella näkyy tiedoston nimi, jossa segmentti sijaitsee.

tuv.prop: Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged.
tuv.seg: This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
Tämä taas muuttaa ko. segmentit “kääntämättä”-tilaan, sillä ne eivät enää vastaa projektimuistiin tallennettuja segmenttejä, vaikka alkuperäiset käännökset ovat edelleen olemassa.

tuv.prop: The following search methods are available:
Search for segments containing the exact string you specified.
tuv.seg: exact search
tarkka haku

tuv.prop: Search project Ctrl+F Displays a dialog to conduct searches in the project

tuv.prop: If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
• Miscellanea: deals with other issues of interest, such as how to avoid losing data.
tuv.seg: The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.
Avoimen lähdekoodin kielityökalua voidaan käyttää korjaamaan yleisiä kieliopillisia ja tyylillisiä virheitä.

tuv.prop: In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.
tuv.seg: Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
Näkymätön muotoilu (eli sellainen, josta ei ole tageja OmegaT-editorissa) säilytetään kohdeasiakirjoissa.

tuv.prop: The Project → Properties...{j}(Ctrl+E) dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
tuv.seg: It is possible to modify the project properties during a translation session.
Käännösistunnon aikana voi muokata projektin ominaisuuksia.

tuv.prop: Regular expressions are also used extensively in the segmentation rules.
OmegaT supports an extensive use of dictionaries and glossaries.
tuv.seg: • Dictionaries, Glossaries, Machine translation , Spellchecker, LanguageTool:
Sanakirjat, sanastot, konekäännös, oikolukija, kielityökalu:

(tiedosto project_save.tmx löytyy

tuv.prop: Mac users should instead use the cmd+key.
tuv.seg: On Apple keyboards the cmd key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
Apple-näppäimistöissä cmd-näppäimessä on joko merkintä {i>command <i}tai Apple-symboli.

tuv.prop: Consequently, although OmegaT is quite able to handle tmx files, it does not include them in the Search files search.
When Full/Half width char insensitive option is checked, searches for fullwidth forms (CJK characters) will match halfwidth forms and vice versa.
tuv.seg: If you click on the button Advanced options additional criteria (author or changer of the translation, date translated, excluding orphan segments, etc) can be selected.
Painiketta Lisäasetukset klikkaamalla voi valita lisäehtoja (käännöksen tekijä tai muuttaja, kääntämisen päivämäärä, orposegmenttien poisjättö, jne).

tuv.prop: • File > Close (Ctrl+W): close the search window (in the same way as Esc)
• Edit > Replace with source (Ctrl+Shift+R): replace with current segment source.
tuv.seg: • Edit > Insert source (Ctrl+Shift+I): insert current segment source.
• Muokkaa > Lisää lähde (Ctrl+Shift+I): lisää valitun segmentin lähde.

tuv.prop: This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.)
tuv.seg: When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
Kun tämä on valittuna, kaikki muotoilutagit poistetaan lähdesegmenteistä.
Ctrl+D Creates the translated
CTRL + D luo käännetyt

tuv.prop: Save Ctrl+S Saves the current work to the
tuv.seg: Displays a dialog to locate an existing project.
Avaa ikkunan olemassa olevan projektin hakemiseksi
Merkitse validoitu syöte

tuv.prop: Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.
tuv.seg: This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.)
Tämä on erityisen hyödyllistä silloin, kun käsitellään tekstejä jos sisäelementtien muotoilu ei ole tarpeen (esim OCRed PDF, huono muunnos, .odt tai .docx jne.)

tuv.prop: The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
tuv.seg: The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by OmegaT.
Segmentointiasetukset vaikuttavat vain siihen, miten OmegaT käsittelee lähdetiedostoja.

tuv.prop: The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories.
tuv.seg: In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
Joissakin tapauksissa muut vaihtoehdot (kuten kappaletason segmentointi) voi olla suositeltavaa.

tuv.prop: Check Glossaries to include the glossaries located in the glossary folder in the search.
When searching through files (as opposed to translation memories), OmegaT restricts the search to files in source file formats.
tuv.seg: • Search in Files: search in a single file or a folder containing a set of files.
• Haku tiedostoista: hakee yhdestä tiedostosta tai kansiosta, joka sisältää useita tiedostoja.

tuv.prop: Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
tuv.seg: You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
Voit lisätä lähtö- ja kohdekielen käsin tai käyttämällä alasvetovalikkoa.
Käännösmuistien uudelleenkäyttö
Shift+Ctrl+W
Vaihto + Ctrl + W

tuv.prop: Until you have some experience with OmegaT, it is safest to consider all settings final once the translation has started – unless of course you realize a major mistake has been made.
tuv.seg: See the section Preventing data loss for ways and means of protecting your work.
Jaksossa {i>Tietojen menettämisen ennaltaehkäisy <i}on neuvoja, joiden avulla voit ehkäistä työsi menettämisen.

tuv.prop: You may have several Search windows open at the same time.
tuv.seg: You can quickly see their contents by looking at their title: it will contain the search term used.
Näet nopeasti niiden sisällön katsomalla otsikkoa: se sisältää käytetyn hakusanan.

tuv.prop: • in source: search in the source segments
• in notes: search in notes to segments
tuv.seg: • in translations: search in the target segments
• käännöksistä: hakee kohdesegmenteistä

tuv.prop: • Edit > Insert source (Ctrl+Shift+I): insert current segment source.
• Edit > Create Glossary Entry (Ctrl+Shift+G): add a new glossary item.
tuv.seg: • Edit > Replace with source (Ctrl+Shift+R): replace with current segment source.
• Muokkaa > Korvaa lähteellä (Ctrl+Shift+R) korvaa: korvaa valitun segmentin lähteellä.

tuv.prop: The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
Double-clicking on a segment opens it in the Editor for modifications (one single click does it when Auto-sync with Editor option is checked).
tuv.seg: Translated segments are displayed with the original text at the top and the translated text at the bottom, untranslated segments are displayed as the source only.
Käännetyt segmentit näkyvät siten, että alkuperäinen teksti näkyy yläreunassa ja käännetty teksti alareunassa, kääntämättömät segmentit näkyvät vain lähteenä

tuv.prop: • '*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
tuv.seg: The search term 'run*' for example would match words 'run', 'runs' and 'running'.
Esimerkiksi hakusana “run*” vastaisi sanoja “run”, “runs” ja “running”.

Tiedostosuodattimet

tuv.prop: It is possible to modify the project properties during a translation session.
Until you have some experience with OmegaT, it is safest to consider all settings final once the translation has started – unless of course you realize a major mistake has been made.
tuv.seg: Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
Huomaa, että projektin asetusten muuttamisesta voi aiheutua seurauksia varsinikin, jos projekti on jo aloitettu.

tuv.prop: Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
A number of rule sets are provided while additional rules can be defined by the user, as described in this chapter.
tuv.seg: The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.
Sääntöihin perustuva segmentointi tarkoittaa usein samaa kuin virkkeeseen perustuva segmentointi.

tuv.prop: Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.

Ennen kuin sinulla on jonkin verran kokemusta OmegaT:stä, on käännöstyön aloittamisen jälkeen parasta pitää kaikkia asetukset lopullisina – paitsi jos huomaat niissä merkittävän virheen.

OmegaT:ssä tunnisteet ovat harmaita, joten ne on helppo tunnistaa.

tuv.prop: Select keyword search to search for any number of individual full words, in any order.
tuv.seg: Search for segments containing all keywords you specified, in any order.
Etsii segmenttejä, jotka sisältävät kaikki määrittelemäsi avainsanat missä hyvänsä järjestyksessä.

tuv.prop: If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by glueing together existing sentence translations.
This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
tuv.seg: Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged.
Segmentointiasetusten muuttaminen voi aiheuttaa käännettyjen segmenttien jakamiseen ja yhdistämiseen.
translation memory files
käännösmuistitiedostot

tuv.prop: • in comments: search in comments to segments
• Translated: search only in translated segments.
tuv.seg: • Translated or untranslated: search in both translated and untranslated segments.
• Käännetyistä tai kääntämättömistä: hakee käännetyistä ja kääntämättömistä segmenteistä.

tuv.prop: They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
tuv.seg: In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
Sekä tarkassa ja avainsanahaussa voidaan käyttää jokerimerkkejä ”*” ja ”?”.

tuv.prop: Search for segments containing all keywords you specified, in any order.
OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.

Valitse haku avainsanoilla, kun haluat etsiä yksittäisiä kokonaisia sanoja missä hyvänsä järjestyksessä.

tuv.seg: Select the method using the radio buttons.

tuv.prop: OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press Ctrl+D to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the /target/ subfolder of your project folder.
tuv.seg: After you have translated each segment, press Ctrl+U to move to the next untranslated segment (or Ctrl+Shift+U to move to the next translated segment).
Kun olet kääntänyt jokaisen segmentin, paina Ctrl + u siirtyäksesi seuraavaan kääntämättömään segmenttiin (tai Ctrl + Vaihto siirtyäksesi seuraavaan käännettyyn segmenttiä).
